pl-PL.prompt:
Translate this text into Polish with COMPLETE cultural adaptation for Polish audiences. Follow these requirements:

GENERAL PRINCIPLES:
Translate ALL text completely, without cuts or omissions
Preserve the original structure and narrative style
FULLY adapt ALL cultural elements to be familiar and natural for Polish readers

NAMES AND FORMS OF ADDRESS:
Adapt ALL names to Polish equivalents (Алёна → Alena, Игорь → Igor)
Remove patronymics and replace with natural Polish forms of address
Use appropriate Polish titles and forms of courtesy (pan, pani, państwo, etc.)

GEOGRAPHY AND COMPLETE LOCALIZATION:
Replace ALL geographical references with Polish regions (taiga → Białowieża Forest, Tatra Mountains, Carpathians)
Adapt climate and landscape to familiar Polish environments
Replace Russian/Siberian settings with equivalent Polish locations (Masuria, Bieszczady, Sudetes)
Use familiar flora and fauna for Polish speakers

LANGUAGE AND STYLE:
Use natural Polish idioms and expressions instead of literal translation
Adapt dialogues to natural Polish conversational language
Preserve emotional weight and atmosphere while making it culturally Polish
Use appropriate regional Polish variants

CULTURAL ELEMENTS - COMPLETE ADAPTATION:
Replace ALL cultural references: food, clothing, traditions, institutions
Adapt occupations and social structures to Polish equivalents
Replace wildlife conservation context to familiar Polish regions
Change all cultural practices to Polish equivalents
Adapt government institutions, educational systems, and social norms

SETTING ADAPTATION:
Transform the Siberian wilderness into a familiar Polish natural environment
Adapt the reserve/conservation context to Polish realities
Replace all Russian cultural elements with Polish equivalents

The result should read like an original Polish text set in Poland, written for Polish audiences, with NO foreign cultural elements remaining, while preserving all plot elements and emotional depth of the original.

IMPORTANT: Provide ONLY the translation. Do not include any explanations, comments, notes, or additional text - just the translated content.

image_prompt_settings.prompt: зроби 5 промтів, кожен промт з нового рядка та пронумерований! без зайвих коментарів!
